unsuppurted_env_desc: You have an unsupported environment installed. Please use this environments: {}.
summary: Save the current configuration of your desktop environment
description: Would you like to save your current configuration including themes, icons, wallpapers, all desktop environment settings, extensions and so on? SaveDesktop can help you with that. Just one click and you have your configuration saved.
filename_spaces_msg: There must be no spaces in the file name
periodic_saving_desc: Changes will only take effect after the next login
import_from_list_error: No configuration was found in the SaveDesktop directory.
import_config_desc: Import the configuration from a file or list.
